No advertisement in the NL (Netherlands?) is not true. It was a lot in the media, only for about two weeks.

When it came to the cinema, Trailers in every commercial block of RTL and SBS6 and even sometime on NED1,2,3. Posters in bus-stops, full page advertisement in papers like Spits and Metro......

Thats funny, in Denmark where I'm from this was a straight-to-dvd release with no advertising at all. If it wasn't for pirated movies I probably would never have heard of it, which would be a shame since this is a pretty decent movie.

That's the price we pay for DL ;o)
